column4: On wireless-G network......only getting 2MB/s and 6ft from AP.  Any ideas
do you have anyone with a wireledd B adapter?
because that will have that effect
Other computer connected at 54mb/s.....Laptop also to 54mb/s
i've really never had such a problem happen to me...
Adapter was fine when running Windows.....never worked @ full speed after Ubuntu
ah, then you need the drivers
i've always had a problem with linksys drivers and such... so just use ndiswrapper...
Even if I am using the restricted drivers?
like i said... i have always had a problem with linksys drivers, ndiswrapper uses the windows drivers and lets you use them (and you said that they work under windows right, so this would be perfect)
Thanks!  I will give it a shot and will be back.
